author: J. Edward Moreno
title: CIA attempting to uncover more accurate China coronavirus numbers: report
description: The CIA has been warning the Trump administration since February that China is underreporting their coronavirus cases, intelligence officials told...
content:
The CIA has been warning the Trump administration since February that China is underreporting their coronavirus cases, intelligence officials told the New York Times. 
China has reported over 82,000 cases and 3,326 deaths about half that of the U.S. in both … [+1858 chars]
